aboutUs.aboutScentQDescription1: Do you ever faced the problem of testing and buying a perfume at the store but after that realizing that the perfume is not suitable at all. This is because testing perfume at the store, does not capture how the perfume evolves with your daily routine when you start wearing it. Do you also find yourself limited by your perfume?
aboutUs.aboutScentQDescription2: That is why ScentQ was founded. ScentQ is a monthly subscription based service that allows you to choose from hundreds of designer fragrances and delivers a 30- day supply right to your doorstep and making it easier and more enjoyable for individuals to explore and enjoy a variety of scents tailored to their preferences
aboutUs.ourMissionDescription: ScentQ passion revolves around spreading happiness through the power of fragrance. Our goal is to transform the way people experience fragrance by providing an exceptional fragrance park right to their doorstep.
